0.user_question: Nani is 8 years old. His brother is twice his age. Nani's sister is 25% younger than him. What is the total age of all three of the family members?

ost_step.1: First calculate Nani's brother's age which is twice Nani’s age; so it would be 2 * 8 = <<2*8=16>>16 years old.
ost_step.2: Next find out Nani's sister who is 25% or ¼ lesser than Nani i.e., (¾) * 8 = <<(3/4)*8=6>>6 years old.
ost_step.3: Finally add up their ages for the resultant sum; thus you get 8+16+6 = <<8+16+6=30>>30 years old.

Finally, adding up the ages together provides the combined age of the whole household as follows : Nani(age), Brother(again calculated above ie..his_brother_age)+ Sis(calculated just nowieh Sister Age)= Total Combined Household Age . Thus , Adding those values gets me Answer ; 8+16+6=30 Years Old.
